description.value:
The magic in your blood radiates psychic force. While under the effect of Innate Sorcery you gain the following additional benefits:

  • You can connect your mind to a number of minds equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can designate these minds at the time of activation.
  • You are able to target creatures that you have your mind connected to as though you can see them even if you cannot, as with casting spells, as long as they are within 150 feet of you.
